relationships.description: Harry looks up at the sky and observes the willow tree, which is being obscured by clouds.
Lupin seizes a broken branch from the ground and prod the knot on the trunk of the willow tree, causing it to stop fighting.
Harry wants to grab the cloak, which is lying there, but Hermione stops him saying they mustn't be seen.
Hermione tries to stop Harry from grabbing the cloak by seizing the back of his robes.
Hagrid is making his way up to the castle, singing at the top of his voice and weaving slightly as he walked.
